sentences.en: Strange fruits hang from the poplar trees.
sentences.cn: 杨树上挂着奇怪的果实。

sentences.en: "Poplar planting in China has been a tremendous success," said Carle.
sentences.cn: “中国在杨树种植方面取得了巨大成功。”卡尔说。

sentences.en: The original Mona Lisa is an oil painting on a board of poplar and is housed at the Louvre Museum in Paris.
sentences.cn: 《蒙娜丽莎》的原作是一幅画在白杨树板上的油画，如今收藏在巴黎的卢浮宫博物馆。
